channel.title: Arbibots, infecting you and hacking your account!
channel.description:
Claimed by powerbot.org http://www.powerbot.org/vb/showthread.php?t=623753
Powerbot is not infected, and due to the recent update with the free trade etc Powerbot will be taking on a massive amount of new members. We would never amount to taking gold from our users. Our primary intent is to keep our users safe, happy and having fun within our community. We have moderators and administrators to keep you safe, but some things may be missed. Firstly, I'd like to point out that Arbiter recently resigned, and after careful consideration and research it would seem that his bot, ArbiBots has been infecting people and taking accounts. If you ever used ArbiBots, please change your password immediately, delete it and file a dispute against the payment on paypal. However, we are not putting the blame fully on them, many java drive-bys, edited versions of RSBot and other things have been posted on the forum. These viruses will have stayed dormant until free trade is out, and then taken the chance to get everything. Because of these two things together, it would appear than ALOT of users have lost their accounts or items. We are not sure how many but we do know ArbiBots has done a fair amount of this. Summary: ArbiBots has been infecting people. File a dispute on Paypal IMMEDIATELY! Also, as there have been many different versions of RSBot recently, & the real RSBot is the only one that is known to be safe we recommend everyone changed their passwords immediately and doesn't use anything but the RSBot client. We would also like to make sure everyone considers virus scanning their computers. Regards, Powerbot. We wish you the best, and the safest botting experienc

item.title: Arbibots, infecting you and hacking your account!
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:14, topic:381077”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=476892.msg3488470#msg3488470 date=1296779889]

[quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=476892.msg3488457#msg3488457 date=1296779425]

Arbiter isn’t hacking any accounts, he’s not scamming anyone, Paris/ins3 is just a nerdy faggot.
[/quote]I’d love to see where you get your facts.

The same to you.
[/quote]I haven’t made any claims here.

Well i’m talking to the co-owner on msn right now, he says it’s “fake and gay”. although i think it might be true.

I would call that a claim.

Arbiter left Powerbot and is running RSBuddy with Jacmob. ins3 knows that powerbot is going to die without Jacmob (because he was basically the only person there who didn’t have his head up his ass) and is trying to draw users away from RSBuddy and back towards Powerbot. If you actually knew about any of the shit that really happened, and not just what was posted on Powerbot & Powerbot’s twitter, you would know I’m right.[/quote]I’m stating an opinion, i’m not saying it’s true.

Read full topic
item.source: Arbibots, infecting you and hacking your account!

Arbiter left Powerbot and is running RSBuddy with Jacmob. ins3 knows that powerbot is going to die without Jacmob (because he was basically the only person there who didn’t have his head up his ass) and is trying to draw users away from RSBuddy and back towards Powerbot. If you actually knew about any of the shit that really happened, and not just what was posted on Powerbot & Powerbot’s twitter, you would know I’m right.
